thread.title: Cougars complete opening day of Texas Regionals
thread.title_full: Cougars complete opening day of Texas Regionals

author: From our community
title: Cougars complete opening day of Texas Regionals
text:
Cougars complete opening day of Texas Regionals RESULTS Cougars complete opening day of Texas Regionals From our community Houston Community Newspapers 
University of Houston Tennis student-athletes Despoina Vogasari and Mina Markovic took the court Thursday on the opening day of the 2015 USTA/ITA Texas Regional Championships at the Mitchell Tennis Center. Vogasari, the reigning Texas Regional Singles Champion, began her title defense with a straight sets victory. 
Making her first career Texas Regionals appearance, Markovic opened her Singles Championship run in the Round of 128, where she faced Alexis Thoma of North Texas. Despite multiple rallies, the Houston sophomore was defeated, 6-2, 6-3. Advertisement 
A junior from Athens, Greece, Vogasari entered the tournament as the No. 3 overall seed and was awarded a bye to the Round of 64 after taking the Texas crown one year ago. In her opening match of the 2015 tournament, the No. 42-ranked singles competitor in all of collegiate tennis faced Jacobea Junger of UTSA. While the first set was a back-and-forth battle, Vogasari got better as the match went on and earned a 7-6 (6-3), 6-2 victory. 
The singles triumph was the 60th of Vogasari’s Houston career and bumped her career Texas Regionals singles record to 7-0. It was also her third career win over Junger in as many tries. 
After singles play to start the day, the Cougars turned their attention to the doubles draw in the afternoon. In the Round of 64, Markovic and Vogasari teamed up to face Maria Kononova and Tamuna Kutubidze from North Texas. The Mean Green duo earned the victory, 6-3. RESULTS 
Alexis Thoma (North Texas) def. Mina Markovic (Houston), 6-2, 6-3 
Singles Round of 64 
No. 42 Despoina Vogasari (Houston) def. Jacobea Junger (UTSA), 7-6 (6-3), 6-2 
Doubles Round of 64 
Maria Kononova/Tamuna Kutubidze (North Texas) def. Despoina Vogasari/Mina Markovic (Houston), 6-3 UP NEXT FOR HOUSTON 
Vogasari starts the second day for Houston, as she faces TCU’s Olaya Garrido-Rivas in the Singles Round of 32. The match begins Friday at 8 a.m. CT. 
Markovic starts her run through the Singles Consolation bracket at 12:30 p.m., while together the Cougar tandem begins Doubles Consolation action at 2 p.m. Both Markovic’s singles opponent and the duo’s doubles foes will be determined earlier Friday morning.
